upgrade_from_version.title: Upgrade From Version
upgrade_from_version.description: Version VSP is being upgraded from. Required for all component upgrades.

upgrade_to_version.title: Upgrade To Version
upgrade_to_version.description: Version VSP is being upgraded to. Required for all component upgrades.

backup_vsd_host_file.title: Backup the /etc/hosts file on VSD
backup_vsd_host_file.description: Backup the /etc/hosts file on VSD before upgrade and restore it after upgrade

skip_disable_stats_collection.title: Skip stats collection disable before upgrade
skip_disable_stats_collection.description: Stats collection should be disabled during VSD upgrade. If for some reason, you would like to disable stats collection outside of MetroAE, change this to true.

force_vsc_standalone_upgrade.title: Force vscs standalone
force_vsc_standalone_upgrade.description: Force all the vscs to deploy in standalone mode, otherwise the vscs will be deployed in ha mode if there are more than one vscs. Do not use this parameter. Support has been removed. This is deprecated and and will be removed in a future release.

upgrade_portal.title: Upgrade SD-WAN Portal(s)
upgrade_portal.description: Upgrade the SD-WAN Portal or Cluster

vsd_preupgrade_db_check_script_path.title: VSD Pre-upgrade Database Check Script Path
vsd_preupgrade_db_check_script_path.description: Path on the MetroAE host to the VSD pre-upgrade database check script

vsd_ejabberd_rpm_file.title: VSD Ejabberd rpm License File
vsd_ejabberd_rpm_file.description: Path to the rpm file for the VSD Patch upgrade to 20.10.R4+ (include the rpm file name itself too)
